author: esammer
msg: - Added a test of an interrupted open(). - Fixed a bad import of junit Assert.

author: esammer
msg: - Removed interrupted start test. Can't reliably know we're going to block during the start method.

author: esammer
msg: - Refactored to use ChannelDriverThread directly. Not sure this is good, but I wanted to try it.

author: esammer
msg: - Added a (currently failing) unit test of an interrupted open() in LogicalNode.

author: esammer
msg: - Fixed a bug where we didn't handle interrupts well in start / stop of LogicalNode. Better, but not totally there yet.
